home_msg:
In April 2021,
I started my carrer as a software engineer.
I live in Tokyo now.
In the future, I will work abroad.
about_msg:
Hello! My name is Kengo and I enjoy creating works online.
I started my career as a web developer after graduating from Tokyo Institute of Technology in 2021.
I have participated in various projects using technologies such as React, Next, Django, PHP, and C#.
